[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    FLOAT 00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000 is converted into TFP   000_00000000_00000000
    FLOAT 00100000_01111111_11111111_00000000 is converted into TFP   001_00000011_11111111
    TFP   000_00000000_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000
    TFP   001_00000011_11111111 is converted into FLOAT 00100000_01111111_11100000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    000_00000000_00000000 + 001_00000011_11111111 = 001_00000011_11111111

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    000_00000000_00000000 * 001_00000011_11111111 = 000_00000000_00000000
